Equipment Actions.Action 1: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 15ft, Average Damage: 21 Piercing
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Claw, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 10ft, Average Damage: 17 Slashing
Equipment Actions.Action 3: Tail, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 20ft, Average Damage: 19 Bludgeoning

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Dragon can use its Frightful Presence.  It then makes 3 attacks, one with its Bite and two with its Claws
Other Actions.Action 2: Frightful Presence, Each creature that is aware of the Dragon must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the Dragon
Other Actions.Action 3: Fire Breath, The Dragon exhales fire in a cone.  Each creature caught in the cone takes an Average 71 Fire damage
Other Actions.Action 4: Weaking Breath, The Dragon exhales gas in a cone.  Each creature caught in the area makes a Strength saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, Strength checks, and Strength saving throws
Other Actions.Action 5: Change Shape, The Dragon magically polymorphs into a humanoid or beast, or back into its true form

Abilities.Ability 1: Amphibious, The Dragon can breathe air and water
Abilities.Ability 2: Legendary Resistance, If the Dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Detect, The Dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Tail Attack, The Dragon makes a Tail attack
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Wing Attack, The Dragon beats its wings.  Nearby creatures make a Dexterity saving throw, failing they take an Average 17 Bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.  The Dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Dragon can take a glimpse into the future, giving it advantage on upcoming rolls
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Dragon attempts to banish a creature it can see to the Dream Plane.  To escape, the creature makes a Charisma check contested by the Dragon
